abstract: There is no way to escape it. Macworld is going to steal some of the thunder from C.E.S. this year.
snippet: There is no way to escape it. Macworld is going to steal some of the thunder from C.E.S. this year.
lead_paragraph: There is no way to escape it. Macworld is going to steal some of the thunder from C.E.S. this year. Usually, the Apple love fest in San Francisco doesn’t begin until C.E.S. in Las Vegas is winding down, but this year it begins Tuesday, the second official day of C.E.S.
